item.title: GA: 5. Hash tables
item.description: Statement This article is my study notes from the book: grokking algorithm: an illustrated guide for programmers and other curious people. Please refer to the original work for more details and indicate the source for reprinting. 1. Requirements for hash function It needs to be consistent. It should map different workds to different numbers. You get a hash table by putting a hash function and an array together.
